title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete miscarriage in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of a dream about miscarriage through books by leading scholars who interpret dreams and visions. Moreover, a miscarriage is one of the worst things a woman will go through in her life, and is a testament to her loss. Fetus. In addition, some people dream of miscarriage and this is one of those dreams that causes fear. Therefore, we present to you, dear followers, all the facts and explanations that point to the symbol of abortion. In a dream, it is complete and its meaning is as we have collected for you the interpretation of a dream about miscarriage and blood and the interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for single people, as well as miscarriage in a complete dream for a family, a married woman and a pregnant woman. And the single - pregnant woman... What is the dream of a miscarriage, just follow this article. Why do you dream that you are expelling Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream is evidence that the woman having the vision suffers from psychological and nervous problems and that she is suffering from stress, and this is a sign that all of this must be It ends. Also, seeing an unmarried girl miscarrying in a dream is complete evidence of the end of the disputes, problems and troubles that she suffered from in her previous life. Seeing the aborted girl in a dream complete means that she will enjoy family life in the coming days of her life. Sleep deprivation for single womenWhy does a virgin dream of a miscarriage? – One of the visions that indicates that she has some problems and obstacles during the period she is experiencing. But a complete miscarriage in a dream for an anxious girl is a good dream that indicates her emergence from a state of sadness and depression. For an ordinary woman, a complete miscarriage in a dream is a sign of escaping from problems and troubles. It also indicates recovery from the disease. Why dream of a miscarriage for a married woman who is not pregnant? The interpretation of miscarriage for a married woman who is not pregnant is one of the visions that indicate problems and obstacles that this woman faces in her life. Also, dreaming of a complete miscarriage for a married woman who has twins means that she faces difficulties and problems during This period. Seeing a complete abortion in a dream for a married woman bleeding from dreams indicates the sins and great sins that she will fall into. Aborting the sleep process for a woman indicates that she is talking to someone who does not hide her secrets. Seeing a complete planned abortion for a married woman in a dream means that she will always fall In darkness and difficulties. Why dream of a pregnant woman miscarriage? Dream interpreters mentioned that dreaming of a pregnant woman miscarriage is one of the visions that indicate intense fear and thinking about bad things. Also, seeing a complete miscarriage in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will go through the stages of pregnancy and childbirth easily and without problems. In addition However, the evidence for this vision has nothing to do with the reality of the pregnant woman, and is just a far-fetched dream. A divorced woman dreams of a miscarriage. A divorced woman’s dream of a miscarriage is clear evidence that she has gone through many bad events in her life and that God will get her out of this situation in the coming days. Interpretation of a complete miscarriage in a dream for a divorced woman is a sign that she has gone through a psychological crisis because of the injustice she was exposed to

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the Holy Kaaba in a dream in detail, and seeing the Kaaba is a dream and a desire for many of us, who do not want to see and visit the Holy Kaaba in reality and awake, but when one sees his dream that he visits the Kaaba, his dream has an interpretation and meaning, so today we present it through this article We will learn about the interpretation of the dream of the Holy Kaaba in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail according to the great Arab interpreters and scholars. A clear and simplified explanation because we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about the Holy Kaaba for single, married and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the Holy Kaaba in a dream as evidence of leadership and direction. Ibn Sirin also interpreted seeing the Holy Kaaba in a dream as a symbol of prayer, as it is the qibla of pilgrims. If one sees the Holy Kaaba in a dream, it is paradise and can be a sign of the fulfillment of a desire. Ibn Sirin added that seeing the Kaaba in a dream means that the dreamer will have a place among people with his knowledge, religion, generosity, or money, and his house will become a destination for people. As for Whoever sees in his dream that he is around the Kaaba, then his dream indicates that he will find work near the Kaaba. As for whoever sees himself entering the Kaaba, his dream symbolizes his marriage and perhaps his justice towards his family and his obedience to them after heedlessness. As for whoever sees in his dream that he entered the Kaaba and was suffering Whoever falls ill while awake, his dream indicates his death in Mecca and his burial there. As for the one who dreams that he circumambulates the Kaaba, the dream promises him good news that he will visit it while awake, and the number of times he circumambulates is the number of years remaining to visit the Kaaba. In general, circling around the Kaaba indicates The Holy Kaaba in a dream indicates effort and struggle to achieve one’s desires. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is standing in front of the Kaaba and begging God Almighty for something, the dream promises him good news for achieving this matter and good news for his promotion to the highest positions in his work. Praying in front of the Kaaba in general in a dream symbolizes good luck. As for someone who sees in his dream that he is crying in front of the Kaaba, his dream is good news that he will get rid of worries and approach relief. If the dreamer sees himself crying in front of the Kaaba and travels, then his dream is good news that he will meet his family. And he returns from his travels. As for whoever sees that he is crying in front of the Kaaba and was sick, his dream heralds recovery. As for whoever sees a dead person crying in front of the Kaaba, the dream promises him good news of forgiveness from his Lord for this dead person. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen saw that seeing the Kaaba in a dream The collapse of its walls indicates the collapse of the rule if he occupies a certain position, but if he does not hold a position, this indicates the death of the ruler. Interpretation of a dream about the Kaaba for a single woman: Seeing the Holy Kaaba in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of a long-awaited desire that will be fulfilled. But if an unmarried woman sees in Her dream is that she is entering the Kaaba, then the dream promises her good news about her marriage to a rich, wise or wise man. But if the unmarried woman sees in her dream the covering of the Kaaba, then her dream is evidence of her honor and purity. As for the unmarried woman who sees in her dream that the Kaaba is covered, then her dream is evidence of her honor and purity.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat. It is one of the dreams that many people search for an interpretation, because some believe that the appearance of meat in a dream is evidence of unpleasant events, especially if blood appears in it. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat: Eating cooked meat in a dream if it has a salty taste, then the dreamer He will suffer in the coming period from a narrow life, but if the cooked meat is made of beef, then it is one of the visions that portend goodness and a feeling of security. Interpretation of the dream of eating cooked meat by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that by seeing a person eating cooked meat, he will be given a lot of money without Make any effort, but if the cooked meat is from birds and the dreamer eats it while feeling happy, then he will move to one of the source countries. Rizq When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating cooked camel meat, this indicates a lot of money that he gets from his enemies, and the great scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that cooked meat in a dream is generally a sign of kindness. All the dreams that you are thinking of will find their interpretation here. The dream interpretation website on Internet from Google. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she is eating cooked meat, then she will hear good news in the coming period, but in the event that she is eating grilled meat and it is spoiled and tastes bad, this indicates that she is going through a period of a lot of trouble that It is difficult to get out of it. A girl dreams of someone eating cooked meat, so she is exposed to gossip and gossip from some people in her life, and she must be careful. An unmarried woman eating cooked lamb meat in a dream indicates some new changes in her life. An unmarried girl eating boiled meat in a dream is a sign of the extensive livelihood that she will have in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about eating lamb meat for a single woman, if the girl sees it in a dream She is cooking lamb and eating it, then this is one of the visions that bodes well, but when you see that she is cooking lamb and she feels happy, this indicates ease and fulfillment in life. Objectives. In the near future. If an unmarried girl sees her kitchen full of cooked lamb, she will be blessed with success. What is the interpretation of eating cooked camel meat in a dream for a single woman? An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is eating cooked camel meat indicates the great happiness and comfort that she will feel in her life in the coming period. He will have a great deal of wealth and righteousness and will live with him a happy and stable life. Seeing an unmarried woman eating cooked camel meat, and its taste was good and delicious, indicates that she achieved the goals and aspirations that she sought and distinguished her from the rest of her peers. If the unmarried dreamer dreams that he is eating cooked camel meat This symbolizes a lot of money that he will get in the coming period from good work or a halal inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked meat for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is cooking meat and eating it is good news for pregnancy in the near future, and the dream of

title: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about rain by Al-Nabulsi: Rain in a dream, as Al-Nabulsi explained, is a sign of achieving goals and abundant sustenance. Whoever sees in a dream that it is raining in one of the familiar places, this is a sign of sadness that will fall upon the dreamer. Seeing the sky raining stones is a sign of many sins. If he sees The dreamer is bathed in rain to get rid of impurity, this indicates repentance. Rain accompanying strong winds is evidence of prosperity and profit from trade. Rain accompanying a rainbow means happiness and good news. The rain has stopped in a dream, and the appearance of the sun is evidence of getting rid of problems and worries. Rain indicates with Lightning and thunderstorms indicate some unexpected circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about rain by Ibn Sirin. Rain is evidence of a lot of goodness and abundance for servants. The dream rain shows the good relationship between the dreamer and his Lord. Rain falling at the wrong time indicates worries and diseases from which the fortuneteller will suffer. Heavy rain shows goodness and nourishment. Seeing rain in the form of ghee or honey indicates blessing and goodness. Rain that falls in the form of blood is evidence of the dreamer’s sins and transgressions. Rain at the beginning of time is evidence of goodness and nourishment. Interpretation of a dream about rain for a single woman. Seeing rain in a girl’s dream is unrelated. It indicates the presence of a person in her life who loves her. He has a high moral character. Light rain in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates happy news. Heavy rain indicates many disputes. Interpretation of a dream about rain for a married woman. Rain in a dream for a married woman is evidence of prosperity and happiness. Rain in a married woman’s dream indicates pregnancy and the birth of a beautiful child. Rain in a dream for a married woman is evidence of a response to a request. Interpretation of a dream about rain for a pregnant woman. Rain for a pregnant woman indicates the safety of her fetus. Rain in a dream indicates an easy and accessible birth. Rain is evidence that she and her husband will give birth to a good child. Interpretation of a dream about rain for a man. Seeing light rain in a man’s dream Evidence of marriage. Rain in a dream indicates good news and plenty of sustenance. Rain in a man’s dream is the elements of a happy conversation that he will hear from someone. Light rain indicates the calm and security that a man feels. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the toilet in a dream and entering the toilet in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about a person entering the bathroom, for a single woman, for a married woman, or for a pregnant woman and relieving herself, washing the dirty toilet, and washing the hand and foot. Interpretation of a sanitary bathroom in a dream Entering the toilet in a dream indicates interest and adoption of something or something. Entering the toilet in a dream indicates that the dreamer He has fears or something that is weighing him down and he wants to get rid of it, or the beginning of solving a problem. What happens in the toilet in a dream can give us an idea of ​​the extent to which the dreamer has managed to distance himself from what he is in waking life. If she goes to the toilet and relieves herself and finishes it easily, this indicates That she will leave it and the next period will be stable and comfortable. If he finds difficulty in relieving himself or does not find water to wash himself with, or if the place or clothes are dirty with virginity or anything that prevents the normal course of defecation, this may indicate that he wants to solve it or get rid of it. They are still causing problems with him, and the obstacles are still in front of him. Seeing defecation in the toilet by washing indicates a complete separation from what was preoccupying the viewer. Whoever washes his hands in the toilet shows that he is abandoning his mother’s affairs, ignoring her, and watching her. Washing your feet in the toilet may indicate the end of your efforts. The toilet can be a husband, a job, or a source. Concern: Interpretation of seeing entering the bathroom in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bull

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream is one of the interpretations that indicates strength, because the bull is in fact a strong animal and it is also one of the animals that is beneficial to humans, especially to farmers. You may also be interested in knowing about butterflies in a dream, as they are used to plow farmland, they are used to carry heavy equipment and tools, and they are sometimes used as a means of transportation. This indicates that this girl will be able to succeed in her work and can make a lot of money in the shortest period of time. If she sees a girl An unmarried woman sees a calm bull in her dream, and this indicates that she will get rid of the problems that existed between her and her husband, and there will be peace and tranquility between them. When she sees that a Taurus woman is enjoying the peace of her sleep, this indicates that he will be able to escape from a problem that he faced, which made him feel terrified. And fear. But if this dreamer sees a red bull. Seeing a bull in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a bull in a dream for a married woman has many indicators. We will show you the most important of them: If a married woman sees a calm bull in her dream and there are problems between her and her husband, this means that these problems will end soon and she will live a life full of peace and stability. The dreamer, when she sees a white bull in her vision, will achieve many successes in her career and will On high positions in the near future. An angry bull in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is always in a state of recklessness and anger and needs to change her personality, control herself, and calm down so as not to create problems between her and her husband. Seeing a married woman with a weak bull in a dream indicates that she is suffering. Seeing a bull in a single woman’s dream: seeing a bull in a single woman’s dream has more than one interpretation. We present some of them as follows: The calmness of a bull in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates success in her work and achieving profits in the near future, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees that she is running away from a bull in her dream, then this vision is interpreted as meaning that she will go through difficult situations in the coming period. These situations will affect her and herself negatively, but she must be stronger. So that he can overcome these situations easily. If an unmarried girl sees a white bull in her dream, the interpretation of this dream is that she will cure diseases, triumph over her enemies, and remove her problems and anxiety. Seeing a bull in a dream for a man There are many interpretations of seeing a bull in a dream for a man. We will provide you with some of these interpretations: If a man sees a bull in a dream, this means that this man will get a promotion at work as quickly as possible, and seeing a bull in a dream indicates that the dreamer has chivalry, strength, and pride, and these are his qualities that make him successful in his life, and God knows best. If a man sees a raging bull in his dream, this means that he feels fear of defeat and loss, and it was also said that the dreamer will face health problems in the next few days, but it will continue for

If an unmarried girl sees a white bull in her dream, the interpretation of this dream is that she will cure diseases, triumph over her enemies, and remove her problems and anxiety. Seeing a bull in a dream for a man There are many interpretations of seeing a bull in a dream for a man. We will provide you with some of these interpretations: If a man sees a bull in a dream, this means that this man will get a promotion at work as quickly as possible, and seeing a bull in a dream indicates that the dreamer has chivalry, strength, and pride, and these are his qualities that make him successful in his life, and God knows best. If a man sees a raging bull in his dream, this means that he feels fear of defeat and loss, and it was also said that the dreamer will face health problems in the next few days, but it will continue for

title: Interpretation of the length of the month in a dream

preview.html: When interpreting the length of the month in a dream, we can say that dream interpretation is one of the most prominent sciences that has achieved remarkable development in recent years, as scientists in this field have reached many rules and foundations that make it possible to apply science with greater accuracy and quality than it was, and this has directly contributed to the ability of the average person to interpret his dreams, either by reading the books published by these scientists or by searching various Internet sites, taking into account the choice of reliable sources. Interpretation of the length of the month in a dream There are those who dream of visions that indicate dates that indicate the day, month or year, and some expect that a specific thing will happen on that date on Earth. The scholar Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi stated it as follows: Interpretation of seeing the month of Muharram in a dream If the dreamer sees the month of Muharram in a dream, this vision carries many positive signs, including: It is considered joyful news, meaning that the dreamer will be cured of any disease and released from prison if he is imprisoned, and it also indicates the help of a person and his salvation from enemies. The dreamer takes a high position and status if he wants it from God Almighty, and if he is poor, God Almighty will make him rich. The meaning of this dream is that the dreamer witnesses a major calamity on earth, such as the emergence of a scholar or the death of an imam who is characterized by justice and piety. If the dreamer travels and withdraws from his people, this vision means that he will return to his people again. If the dreamer is traveling and afraid of drowning and winds, this dream means that he and those with him will be saved from all harm. It indicates God Almighty's repentance to the dreamer in the event of his disobedience and committing his sins. This dream indicates the dreamer's return from his sins, misguidance and haste. If the dreamer desires a righteous son, this dream means that God will bless him with a son in reality. The dreamer will return to his place if he moved away from it. Perhaps this vision is a sign that Muslims will receive a great reward and booty. Interpretation of seeing the month of Safar in a dream If the dreamer sees a month of travel in a dream, this is an indication of certain indications. The dream of this month does not bring with it much good, but it also does not bring much bad to people who have suffered from heartbreak or distress. If the dreamer is sick, this vision is evidence of enjoying health and recovery. From diseases. Interpretation of seeing Rabi al-Awwal in a dream Perhaps this vision indicates the birth of a righteous son and the end of all hardships and pains. If the dreamer is a merchant, this means that he feels happy and joyful, his trade will be profitable and blessings will increase. This dream may indicate the victory of the oppressed and the death of the distress or ordeal that befell the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about the month of Rabi al-Akhir If the dream is in the month of Rabi al-Thani, this means that the dreamer gives birth to a son who is a hero or a scholar, and it also indicates his victory over enemies. If the vision shows evil, this means its rapid appearance, acceleration, and if it is good, this means that its appearance is slow on earth. Interpretation of seeing the month of Jumada al-Awwal in a dream When we see this month in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision

title: Interpretation of a dream that says God is Great out loud in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about saying God is great in a loud voice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many dreams that a person sees in his sleep, but they have different meanings, some of which are good and others are a warning and warning to a Muslim, and among the evidence is the interpretation of a dream of God saying God is great in a loud voice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about God saying God is great in a loud voice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Greatest out loud by Ibn Sirin, where the scholar of interpretation, scholar Ibn Sirin, worked on developing a group of different connotations and interpretations to explain seeing God’s greatest saying in a dream and hearing it out loud, and they are explained in the following points: Seeing someone saying that God is great in a dream means that he will receive abundant sustenance. In the coming period. Saying that God is Great in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions of happiness and contentment. Hearing the takbir in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get married soon. Growing up in a dream is an indication of an improved state of vision and the acquisition of money. Hearing the takbir in a dream for the one who sees the vision is A sign of salvation from various worries and troubles. If a person sees the takbir in a dream, this is good news for him about a happy occasion in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person kissing in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about God saying wonderful out loud in a dream Sheikh Al-Nabulsi also interpreted his dream by saying that God is great in the dream with a number of connotations and interpretations that together indicate a lot of goodness for the vision, which are represented in the following: If a person sees that he says that God is great in the dream, then this is a sign of his repentance to God and stopping his sins. And disobeying Him. Seeing someone saying that God is great in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate a change in social and psychological circumstances. Seeing a dreamer saying that God is great in a dream means that he is not satisfied with himself and wants to do good deeds to get closer to God. If he sees The person himself says that God is great in a dream, this indicates his good condition. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a boy in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream that says that God is great with a loud voice in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation scholars depend on the interpretation of different dreams on the situation. Social for the dreamer. Dream interpreters have worked on interpreting the vision of saying that God is the best out loud in a single girl’s dream with a group of clues represented in: Hearing an unmarried woman say “Allahu Akbar” in a dream indicates her salvation from the worries and problems she faces in her life. If an unmarried woman sees “Allahu Akbar” in a dream. This is good news of her return to God and her avoidance of transgressions and misdeeds. Seeing a single girl approaching her dream means that she has reached her dreams that she was striving to achieve. Hearing someone say “Allahu Akbar” in a dream is a sign of abundant sustenance. If an unmarried girl hears “Allahu Akbar” in a dream, this is a sign. However, her situation will change for the better. If an unmarried woman hears the takbir in a dream when she is sick, this indicates that she is recovering from the illness she was suffering from. If an unmarried girl hears that God is the greatest in a dream, this means that

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deceased uncle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deceased uncle in a dream. We will learn about the dream interpretation of seeing a deceased uncle in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and interpreters, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deceased uncle in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dead uncle in a dream. Perhaps it represents following the path of the uncle, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a woman Married in a dream to her deceased uncle in her house, this may indicate that she is walking in the path of the uncle, and God knows the unseen. While seeing the deceased uncle crying in a dream may indicate the deceased’s need for supplication and charity, and God knows the unseen. Because seeing the deceased uncle happy may indicate Goodness and comfort after death, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream that I feed my dead grandmother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I feed my dead grandmother in a dream. The vision of feeding the dead can indicate the good that the dreamer gains, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees feeding the dead in a dream, this may indicate Sustenance, and God knows everything that is not seen, while seeing eating with a dead grandmother may indicate losses, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a young man sees himself eating with his grandmother in a dream, this may express the losses he is exposed to, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing A dead child in a dream could be a sign of some unwanted issues, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a dead child, this may be evidence of trouble for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a dead child in a dream, this may express a lack of livelihood, And God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees a dead child in a dream, this may indicate the problems that she will fall into, and God knows all that he did not see. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased sister sad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my dead sister sad in a dream may indicate her need for supplication, and God knows the unseen. If she sees A married woman sees her dead sister sad in a dream. This may indicate a bad family situation and corruption of religion, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When an unmarried young man sees his dead sister sad in a dream, this may indicate corruption in morals, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his deceased sister sad, he should not pray. For the sister, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my deceased brother being sick in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my deceased brother being sick in a dream. To see a sick dead person may mean despair, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees a sick dead person in a dream, it expresses the despair that the dreamer is experiencing, and God knows best. When she sees A dead, unmarried, sick girl in a dream. This may be evidence of the dreamer’s shortcomings in parental rights, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees a dead sick person in a dream, he can express his need for prayer and seeking forgiveness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my dead cousin in a dream. Interpretation of dreams to see my son. My dead uncle in a dream can be a sign of relief from stress, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a dead cousin in a dream can also indicate relief, God willing. In the event that a young man sees...

title: Interpretation of theft in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin in seeing theft: Ibn Sirin considered seeing theft in a dream to be one of the behaviors that indicate deception, falling into evil, and hatred. As for someone who sees someone stealing his house or money, this indicates that this person marries one of the people in the dreamer’s house and sees someone stealing an animal that he uses. The owner of the dream, such as a horse, for example, this is evidence that you are traveling with this person or that it will be a reason for the owner of the dream to travel. And whoever gets married and sees in a dream that someone is stealing his wife’s gold, this indicates that it will benefit him in reality. And whoever sees someone stealing his house from... Someone, this is a sign of being accused of something from this person. And whoever sees someone stealing his clothes in a dream, this means that this person will be an occasion for the dreamer’s marriage. Whoever steals books belonging to the dreamer will benefit from his knowledge in reality. Whoever steals the dreamer's keys is actually trying to block his path to success in something. Who steals cards? A character or any cards of the dream owner, in reality, speak badly about him and say about him what is not in it. Interpretation of seeing a closed house in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted the theft of the owner of the dream house as an indication of a state of confusion and imbalance that the dream owner suffers from, and it could be the marriage of the thief. From one of the people of this house. Interpretation of theft in a dream: When the dreamer sees himself stealing, this is evidence of his fear and stress over something such as illness, poverty, or death, and this dream may indicate monogamous marriage. Interpretation of theft in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees her eating food or... If her money is stolen, this is evidence of her future marriage, but if she is robbed in any other way, this is evidence of unwanted things happening because she is wasting her time doing worthless things. Interpretation of theft in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman being robbed in a dream indicates the constant marital strife in which she lives, but if she sees herself stealing and running away, this is evidence of the stability of her marital life.
